# HUD::SET_BLIP_ALPHA

## Summary
Change Radar blip alpha

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **INT** alpha

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets alpha-channel for blip color.

Example:

Blip blip = HUD::ADD_BLIP_FOR_ENTITY(entity);
HUD::SET_BLIP_COLOUR(blip , 3);
HUD::SET_BLIP_ALPHA(blip , 64);
